Room.Name: Granny's Still Room
Room.Description: You are in Granny Jenkins' still room. The smell of whiskey is heady, and the bottles of it on the floor make your mouth water and your mind swirl. You also see a very large still. So THIS is why there are so many grain fields! The exit is to the east.

Room.Name: The Big Intersection
Room.Description: You are in the big intersection between Raff Way and Impy Way. Crowds of people walk past you as they go on their daily tasks. Raff Way continues east and west, and Impy Way runs north and south.

Exit.Description: A tunnel moves down under the city.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. You can see a leather shop east and a blacksmith west. To the north you see a big intersection, and Impy Way continues south.

Room.Name: The Blacksmith
Room.Description: You are in a black and smelly room. Pieces of metal are strewn all over the floor, and a wave of heat from a big furnace hits you. An anvil sits on one side of the room, and on the other side is a workbench. The exit is east.

Room.Name: The Leather Shop
Room.Description: You are in a brown and smelly room. Pieces of leather are strewn all over the floor. The smell of burnt hide assaults your nose. You can tell by the looks that the tanning is done VERY CLOSE to here! A table is near the entrance. The exit is west.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. To the east is a meat store, and to the west is a pawn shop. Impy Way continues north and south. People are rushing around you to go to these stores.

Room.Name: The Pawn Shop.
Room.Description: You are in a little shop filled with a lot of knick knacks and semi- valuable goods. There is a display case full of little treasures that you are sure that you or any other little kid would like to touch! The exit is east.

Room.Name: The Meat Store
Room.Description: You are in a meat store. Hanging on hooks are meats of many kinds of animals. In the background, you can hear the sound of blade against flesh. It smells like meat here (which is not a good smell). The exit is west.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. To the east is Farmer's Market, and to the west is Nyles' House of Ale. Impy Way runs north and ends south of here. You can hear the sound of housewives gossiping at the market.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Impy Way.
You see Nyles' House of Ale.

Room.Name: Nyles' House of Ale
Room.Description: This is a very busy bar, with everyone holding homemade bottles of ale. You see even the more gentile persons here, laughing along with Nyles, who offers you a quart of ale too.

Room.Name: Farmer's Market
Room.Description: You see many carts filled with fruits and vegetables. Many farmers are all trying to sell you their produce, each saying their's is better. The exit is west.

Room.Name: The End of Impy Way
Room.Description: You are at the end of Impy and of the city part of Ofcol. To the east is a dirt road leading toward the farm animals. West from here are fields. Impy Way continues north.

Room.Name: Fields
Room.Description: You are in a corn field. You can't see far, since the corn stalks are taller than you are. You remember that the end of Impy Way is east of here, and you think you see a building to the north. The field continues south and west.

Exit.Description: You think you see a building north of here.
You remember that the end of Impy Way is east.
You can make a path to the fields south.
You can make a path to the fields west.

Room.Name: Fields
Room.Description: You are among fruit trees in a field. You see many apple and orange trees. You can make out the corn fields north and some vegetable patches west. The sight of the fruit makes your mouth water.

Room.Name: Fields
Room.Description: You are among the vegetable fields. You see many cabbage and lettuce patches, along with tomato bushes and potato plants. To the east are some fruit trees, and north are some wheat fields.

Room.Name: Fields
Room.Description: You are among the wheat fields. The gentle caress of the wheat and the cool shadow from the tall stalks and scarecrow lulls you to sleep and dream of a little girl and little dog from a faraway place. To the east are the corn stalks, and south of you are the vegetable patches.

Room.Name: The Shed
Room.Description: You are in the storage shed. Bales of wheat, corn and hay are piled against the wall, and some vegetables are in carts. You see a small door to the west. The main exit is south.

Room.Name: Slaughterhouse
Room.Description: You are in the slaughterhouse, where all the animals are slaughtered so that they can be sold or their skins be tanned. The scream of dying animals makes your stomach churn. The exit is to the west.

Room.Name: Dirt Road
Room.Description: You are on a dirt road. To the east is a barn, and you see a big chicken coop south of you. The dirt road continues north and west.

Room.Name: Chicken Coop
Room.Description: You are in the chicken coop. The smell of chickens and chicken droppings makes you gasp. The exit is north.

Exit.Description: You can sense the fresh air.

Room.Name: Barn
Room.Description: You are in a barn. There are some cows here, munching on mounds of hay. Milk is milked and bottled here. You see the exit west.

Room.Name: Dirt Road
Room.Description: You are on a dirt road. To the north and south, you see some grass fields. There is a pigsty west, and the dirt road continues east.

Room.Name: Grass Field
Room.Description: You are in a grass field. Fences block the way north, east, and west. The dirt road is to the south.

Room.Name: Grass Field
Room.Description: You are in a grass field. Fences block the way south, east, and west. The dirt road is to the north.

Room.Name: Pig Sty
Room.Description: For some reason, you are in a pig sty. You wonder why you are standing in muck. To realize your senses and notice the dirt road is to the east.

Exit.Description: You see the dry dirt road.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. East and west of you are big houses. Impy Way continues north and reaches a big intersection south. Children are running to from home to home.

Room.Name: Big House
Room.Description: You are in a big house. Evidently, the owners of this house are richer than the average citizen, since there is more than one room to this house. A door leads to the kitchen east, and a bedroom is upstairs. The exit is to the west.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in the bedroom. There isn't much of interest except for a bed and a closet. The stairs lead back down.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Kitchen
Room.Description: You are in a kitchen. There isn't much of interest here. The main room is west of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Big House
Room.Description: You are in a big house. Evidently, the owners of this house are richer than the average citizen, since there is more than one room to this house. A door leads to the kitchen west, and a bedroom is upstairs. The exit is to the east.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in the bedroom. There isn't much of interest except for a bed and a closet. The stairs lead back down.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Kitchen
Room.Description: You are in a kitchen. There isn't much of interest here. The main room is east of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. Houses are to the east and west of here. Impy Way continues north and south. There are many people walking along the streets.

Room.Name: House
Room.Description: You are in a house. The living room and kitchen are all bundled into this room. There is a bedroom south of here. The exit is west.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a bedroom. There isn't much of interest here except for a bed and a dresser. The main room of the house is north of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: House
Room.Description: You are in a house. The living room and kitchen are all bundled into this room. There is a bedroom south of here. The exit is east.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a bedroom. There isn't much of interest here except for a bed and a dresser. The main room of the house is north of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Impy Way
Room.Description: You are on Impy Way. Houses are to the east and west of here. Impy Way continues south. To the north is a big intersection. There are many people walking along the streets.

Room.Name: House
Room.Description: You are in a house. The living room and kitchen are all bundled into this room. There is a bedroom south of here. The exit is west.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a bedroom. There isn't much of interest here except for a bed and a dresser. The main room of the house is north of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: House
Room.Description: You are in a house. The living room and kitchen are all bundled into this room. There is a bedroom south of here. The exit is east.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in a bedroom. There isn't much of interest here except for a bed and a dresser. The main room of the house is north of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: The Big Intersection
Room.Description: You are on the intersection of Impy Way and Swiftest Way. To the north of you is a big house. Swiftest Way runs east and west, and Impy way continues south. There are quite a few people on this intersection.

Room.Name: Big House
Room.Description: You are in a big house. Evidently, the owners of this house are richer than the average citizen, since there is more than one room to this house. A door leads to the kitchen north, and a bedroom is upstairs. The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: Bedroom
Room.Description: You are in the bedroom. There isn't much of interest except for a bed and a closet. The stairs lead back down.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Kitchen
Room.Description: You are in a kitchen. There isn't much of interest here. The main room is east of here.

Exit.Description: You see the main room of the house.

Room.Name: Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north and south of you. Swiftest Way continues east, and west is a big intersection.

Room.Name: Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north and south of you. Swiftest Way continues east and west.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: End of Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north, south, and east of you. Swiftest Way continues west.

Room.Name: Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north and south of you. Swiftest Way continues west, and to the east you see a big intersection.

Room.Name: Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north and south of you. Swiftest Way continues east and west.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: The end of Swiftest Way
Room.Description: You are on Swiftest Way, the commoner's residential area. Small houses are north, south, and west of you. Swiftest Way continues east.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the west.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the south.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the north.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Small House
Room.Description: You are in a small house, owned by a commoner of Ofcol. There isn't much of value here to you, but you'd bet that the owner really cherishes the pile of stuff here. The exit is to the east.

Exit.Description: You see the end of Swiftest Way.

Room.Name: Raff Way
Room.Description: You are on Raff Way. To the west, you can see a big intersection. To the east, you see Raff Way continue toward the Golden Citadel. There are beautiful flowers growing along the road here, making this more of a garden than a road.

Room.Name: Raff Way
Room.Description: You are on Raff Way. Raff Way continues west to the city of Ofcol. To the east, you see Raff Way continue toward the Golden Citadel. There are beautiful flowers growing along the road here, making this more of a garden than a road.

Exit.Description: You see the entrance of the Golden Citadel.

Room.Name: Dirt Road
Room.Description: You are on a dirt road. To the east is a large building with a bad smell emanating from it. To the west is the end of Impy Way, and this road continues south.

Exit.Description: You see the large building with the bad smell.
You see the end of Impy Way.

Room.Name: The Temple of Ofcol
Room.Description: You are in the Temple of Ofcol. Golden tiles cover the floor, and solid gold columns reach the twelve foot ceiling of this vast chamber. Servants in golden livery wander this place, making even the raggiest messenger boy look richer than you are. Exits lead to the anterooms in the cardinal directions.

Room.Name: The Anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol
Room.Description: You are in an anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol. Gold tiles cover the floor, and servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. The temple is to the south, and to the north is a hallway. A stairways leads up.

Room.Name: The Anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol
Room.Description: You are in an anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol. Gold tiles cover the floor, and servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. The temple is to the east, and to the west is a hallway. A stairways leads up.

Room.Name: The Anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol
Room.Description: You are in an anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol. Gold tiles cover the floor, and servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. The temple is to the west, and to the east is a hallway. A stairways leads up.

Room.Name: The Anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol
Room.Description: You are in an anteroom to the Temple of Ofcol. Gold tiles cover the floor, and servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. The temple is to the north, and to the south is a hallway. A stairways leads up.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead east and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead east, west, and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead west and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead north and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead north and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead to the cardinal directions, with the east leading toward the Temple of Ofcol, and west leading toward the City of Ofcol.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead west, north and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead north and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead north and south.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead north and east.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead east, west, and north.

Room.Name: A Hallway of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in a hallway of the Golden Citadel. Gold tiles cover the floors, and rich golden tapestries drape the walls. Servants in golden livery pass you by peaceably. Exits lead west and north.

Room.Name: An Upper Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the upper chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decora- tions of this place surpass even those of the first floor. Gold tiles etched with platinum cover the floor, walls and the ceiling. The lights from numerous torches reflect from these shimmering planes, giving the illusion that you are standing in a gem. Stairways lead up and down, and the hall leads south.

Room.Name: An Upper Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the upper chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decora- tions of this place surpass even those of the first floor. Gold tiles etched with platinum cover the floor, walls and the ceiling. The lights from numerous torches reflect from these shimmering planes, giving the illusion that you are standing in a gem. Stairways lead up and down, and the hall leads east.

Room.Name: The Hall of the DragonLords
Room.Description: You are in a vast hall, filled with the commanders of the Golden Citadel. Golden tiles etched with platinum cover the floors, and weapons of all types are mounted on the walls of this meeting hall. Surrounding a solid gold table are four sons of the Keeper of the Golden Citadel. They smile at you and ask you to join them in lunch. Exits lead to the cardinal directions.

Room.Name: An Upper Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the upper chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decora- tions of this place surpass even those of the first floor. Gold tiles etched with platinum cover the floor, walls and the ceiling. The lights from numerous torches reflect from these shimmering planes, giving the illusion that you are standing in a gem. Stairways lead up and down, and the hall leads west.

Room.Name: An Upper Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the upper chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decora- tions of this place surpass even those of the first floor. Gold tiles etched with platinum cover the floor, walls and the ceiling. The lights from numerous torches reflect from these shimmering planes, giving the illusion that you are standing in a gem. Stairways lead up and down, and the hall leads north.

Room.Name: A Top Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the top chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decorations of this room looks like a dragon's hoard. The whole room is carved out of pure gold, and gems of all types glitter from the walls, ceiling, even the floor. It is obvious that this room was not meant for you to intrude upon. A stair- case leads back down, and a doorway leads south.

Room.Name: A Top Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the top chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decorations of this room looks like a dragon's hoard. The whole room is carved out of pure gold, and gems of all types glitter from the walls, ceiling, even the floor. It is obvious that this room was not meant for you to intrude upon. A stair- case leads back down, and a doorway leads east.

Room.Name: The Dragon Chamber
Room.Description: You are in a vast chamber carved from gold and platinum. Gems the size of a man's fist protrude from the walls, ceiling, and the floor, making your step painful. A vast open sky-light lets fresh air come in from the top. In the center of this chamber, you see a great wealth of coins, and on top of that pile of coins, you see a golden dragon squinting at you. Exits lead to the cardinal directions to the anterooms.

Room.Name: A Top Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the top chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decorations of this room looks like a dragon's hoard. The whole room is carved out of pure gold, and gems of all types glitter from the walls, ceiling, even the floor. It is obvious that this room was not meant for you to intrude upon. A stair- case leads back down, and a doorway leads west.

Room.Name: A Top Chamber of the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are in one of the top chambers of the Golden Citadel. The decorations of this room looks like a dragon's hoard. The whole room is carved out of pure gold, and gems of all types glitter from the walls, ceiling, even the floor. It is obvious that this room was not meant for you to intrude upon. A stair- case leads back down, and a doorway leads north.

Room.Name: Above the Dragon Chamber
Room.Description: You are above the Dragon Chamber. You curiously note that this shaft that connects the chamber to the sky is wide enough that even a dragon can fit through. This shaft leads up and down.

Room.Name: In the Shaft from the Dragon Chamber
Room.Description: You are in the shaft leading from the Dragon Chamber. Below you lies the Dragon Chamber of the Golden Citadel. Above you, you see the sky, but currently, the way out is sealed by a layer of diamond that looks impenetrable.

Room.Name: Inside the Entrance to the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are inside the entrance to the Golden Citadel. Rich golden tapestries line the walls, and golden tiles cover the floors. The exit to this citadel is to the west, while the citadel itself is to the east.

Room.Name: Outside the Entrance to the Golden Citadel
Room.Description: You are outside the entrance to the Golden Citadel. A great gate is to to the east, marking the entranceway into the citadel. The road also leads back west to Raff Way.

NPC.name: oldstyle cityguard guard
NPC.description: This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter. He is fully armed and armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision. Luckily for you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of Ofcol.
NPC.longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is standing here, making sure there is no trouble.

NPC.name: oldstyle derrick captain guard cityguard
NPC.description: Derrick is a very big man. He has acquired this station, not by brains or charm, but by brute strength. He had fought in three orc wars and is a descendent of a surviving cityguard of old Thalos. He believes that everything has to be hard won to be kept, and that laxity is for the weak.
NPC.longDescription: Derrick, Captain of the Guard, is here disciplining his guards.

NPC.name: oldstyle jacklyn captain guard cityguard
NPC.description: Jacklyn is pale and wiry, but then, so are most other witches. The fact that Jacklyn is a mage and a warrior makes her the perfect captain of the citadel guards. Jacklyn is very beautiful, but whether it is due to her pale softness or her magic, no one has ever found out. She isn't very strong physically, but she need not be.
NPC.longDescription: Jacklyn, Captain of the Citadel Guard, is here raising morale.

NPC.name: oldstyle jim blacksmith
NPC.description: Jim is big and brawny, just like what you'd expect of a blacksmith. He is smiling a very big smile, as he looks at your coins. You wonder if he likes the metals or the value of the coins.
NPC.longDescription: Jim the Blacksmith is here, selling his latest works of metal.

NPC.name: oldstyle sam
NPC.description: Sam is a middle-aged workman. He looks tired, but never too tired to get that last sale from you. He grins at you slightly.
NPC.longDescription: Sam is here, selling his leather works.

NPC.name: oldstyle madam tracy
NPC.description: Madam Tracy is a bit old, but not to the point of senility. Besides, she knows the hard ways of this world and is ready for it. She spends her time at the shop, trading little things (for a wee bit of profit).
NPC.longDescription: Madam Tracy is here, selling and buying little treasures.

NPC.name: oldstyle marty
NPC.description: Marty is a big man. He used to hunt the animals he sells, but now he lets his son, Jim, raise and slaughter the animals for him. Marty still knows how to kill, though.
NPC.longDescription: Marty the meat store owner is here, selling you his choice meats.

NPC.name: oldstyle elizabeth farmer
NPC.description: Elizabeth is a very happy woman. She can't believe the nice weather here in Ofcol, and the great vegetables this land produces is unbelievable to her too. Farmer Elizabeth smiles at you nicely, but you bet she is doing that just to get a good price off of you!
NPC.longDescription: Farmer Elizabeth is here, selling the latest crop.

NPC.name: oldstyle granny jenkins
NPC.description: Granny Jenkins is a feeble woman, but she knows her brew. She might be very old, but she is still in charge of the still. She cackles lightly at herself every time she tastes her whiskey, which is quite often! Granny Jenkins cackles again.
NPC.longDescription: Granny Jenkins is here, running the still.

NPC.name: oldstyle jack
NPC.description: Jack is the son of Marty, and you can see the family resemblance (especially in their shared affinity for slaughtering animals. ) Jack leers at you as you enter. "Came by to watch, eh?" , he asks.
NPC.longDescription: Jack is here slaughtering away at the animals.

NPC.name: oldstyle Sarah farmer
NPC.description: Farmer Sara is all covered with bits of straw and grime, but underneath all that, she doesn't look that bad. She smiles at you demurely, and goes back to her work.
NPC.longDescription: Farmer Sara is here, milking the cows.

NPC.name: oldstyle chicken hen
NPC.description: The hen has yellow feathers and small wings. It looks like a chicken, if you've ever seen one.
NPC.longDescription: A hen is here, squawking at your intrusion.

NPC.name: oldstyle cow
NPC.description: The cow is here happily grazing. It moos at you and goes back to grazing.
NPC.longDescription: A cow is here, munching on grass.

NPC.name: oldstyle cow
NPC.description: The cow is just standing here. She moos at you and otherwise ignores you.
NPC.longDescription: A cow is here, waiting to be milked.

NPC.name: oldstyle horse young
NPC.description: The horse whinnies at you, then runs around you a few times, then just goes back to grazing.
NPC.longDescription: A young horse is here, grazing.

NPC.name: oldstyle pig
NPC.description: The pig looks dirty. It snorts and sniffs at you, then goes back to its slop.
NPC.longDescription: A pig is playing here, getting itself and you dirty.

NPC.name: oldstyle citizen man
NPC.description: The citizen smiles at you. He is having a great day, and he wishes the same for you. He looks at you strangely, though, wondering why you are so armed and armored.
NPC.longDescription: A citizen is here, smiling at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle citizen woman
NPC.description: The citizen smiles at you. She is having a great day, and she wishes the same for you. She looks at you strangely, though, wondering why you are so armed and armored.
NPC.longDescription: A citizen is here, smiling at you.

NPC.name: oldstyle child boy
NPC.description: The little boy looks up at you and says, 'Hi. Can I have a piece of candy? ' He then smiles and runs away, remembering his game.
NPC.longDescription: A boy is here, playing tag and other kids' games.

NPC.name: oldstyle child girl
NPC.description: The little girl looks up at you and says, 'Hi. Can I have a pretty little coin? ' She then smiles and runs away, remembering her game.
NPC.longDescription: A girl is here, playing jump jacks and other kids' games.

NPC.name: oldstyle maid woman
NPC.description: The maid startles at your presence. 'You are ruining my floors! Wait till Master and Mistress come back. You will get me in trouble! Shoo! ', she says. She hits you with her broom.
NPC.longDescription: A maid is here, cleaning the house and preparing the next meal.

NPC.name: oldstyle Nyles
NPC.description: Nyles is a hefty guy, who looks like he's waiting for the next bar fight to join in. He keeps an eye on you and his glasses, making sure you don't steal any.
NPC.longDescription: Nyles the Bartender is here, ready to serve you up a good brew.

NPC.name: oldstyle cityguard guard
NPC.description: This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter. He is fully armed and armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision. Luckily for you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of Ofcol.
NPC.longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is posted here to guard the gate.

NPC.name: oldstyle bard
NPC.description: After years of traveling around the world, this bard has decided to stay in the peaceful city of Ofcol, and to sing of its unmatched glories. He smiles at you, hinting toward a tip from you in ever a subtle way.
NPC.longDescription: A bard is here, singing of the glories of Ofcol.

NPC.name: oldstyle servant
NPC.description: The servant smiles good-naturedly at you, then goes on his duties.
NPC.longDescription: A servant is here, carrying the duties of the Keeper of the Golden Citadel.

NPC.name: oldstyle squire
NPC.description: This young man smiles at you, but is too busy to chat.
NPC.longDescription: A squire is here, scurrying from duty to duty.

NPC.name: oldstyle page
NPC.description: The page smiles for you, asking if he can do you a favor too.
NPC.longDescription: A page is here, sending a message to his knight.

NPC.name: oldstyle priestess
NPC.description: The Priestess of Ofcol is an old woman, perfectly at peace with herself and with the world. She devotes all her time to help teach you the ways of her god, Bahamut. The dragon symbol around her neck looks almost alive.
NPC.longDescription: The Priestess of Ofcol is here, blessing you with her beatific smile.

NPC.name: oldstyle chaplain Jerrold
NPC.description: He smiles at you, with the enthusiasm of a little kid. "What're you doing just STANDING here, young man? Go help that other squire there!" , he yells. He turns to you and with a consipatory tone, whispers, "Kids!"
NPC.longDescription: Jerrold, the chaplain of this Citadel, is here directing the activities of the people around here.

NPC.name: oldstyle dragonlord lord dragon
NPC.description: This person looks almost like a dragon itself. His golden scales gleam with power. He smiles at you with a vicious grin. You're happy that he doesn't look upset at your presence.
NPC.longDescription: A knight wearing the scales of a dragon stands here.

NPC.name: dragon gold
NPC.description: This dragon's head is taller than you. He is annoyed at your disturbance, but realizing that you're no danger to him, he ignores you. He waves to one of his attendants to escort you away.
NPC.longDescription: An old dragon shimmering with the colors of this cavern peers at you sleepily.

NPC.name: oldstyle attendant
NPC.description: This elder servant to the Gold Dragon is very loyal to him, willing to risk his life for his liege.
NPC.longDescription: A person robed in gold is attending to the Keeper of the Citadel.

NPC.name: dragonknight knight dragon
NPC.description: This person looks like a dragon itself. His golden scales gleam with power. He smiles at you, showing very sharp teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A person dressed in the scales of a gold dragon stands here, guarding the Golden Citadel.

NPC.name: oldstyle cityguard guard
NPC.description: This guard is surely a trained and skilled fighter. He is fully armed and armored, and he uses his equipment with a practiced precision. Luckily for you, this guard will only use his deadly skills for the good of the citizens of Ofcol.
NPC.longDescription: An Ofcol cityguard is posted here to guard the gate.

Item.Name: axe hand
Item.LongDescription: A hand axe is on the floor here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a finely made axe. Iron, with a nice wooden shaft, this axe can withstand years of use.

Item.Name: meat cleaver
Item.LongDescription: A sharp meat cleaver is just lying on the floor here!

ExtraDescription.Description: This meat cleaver is made of good steel.

Item.LongDescription: A heavy polearm is against the wall here, ready to inflict damage.
